name: devilry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an evil action or activity that is connected with devils or the devil: I lack words to describe such devilry. According to folklore the little demons come into their own on Walpurgis Night and get up to all sorts of devilry. Synonym
devildom
[ U ] intentional bad behaviour by someone who finds it funny or enjoyable: The twins looked innocent, but showed hints of devilry.
More examplesFewer examplesA witch has magic in her fingers and devilry dancing in her blood.It is hard to know where piety ends and devilry starts in his religious art.A thousand devilries were feared from these cults: they would throw themselves off steeples, they would set themselves alight, they would run amok with weapons.A perverse sense of devilry urged her to lead him on.
